wishwa koshaya dakwana mathaya "janathawa wetha pawari athi ha owun wisin ho owunge niyojithayan wisin nidahas mathiwaranayak yatathe kelinma kriyathmaka karanu labana janatha palanayak" ihatha siyaluma prakashayange podu adahasa wanne pudgalayage paudgalikathwaya garu karana pudgalayage paurushaya wardhanaya karana pudgala ayithiwasikam surakina aandu kramayak prajathanthrawadi aandukramayak bawayi shri lankawe parani rajandu krama thula pawathi prajathanthrawadi lakshana raju wisinma palanaya ha nithi kramaya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha rajyaye diyunuwa ha ehi karyayan pawathwa gena yamata raja sabhawak pathkirima ha owunata wisheshitha balathala pawarima, ema niladharin athara aapa ,mapa,senewirath,bhandagarika ha mahalekam yana 05 dena pramukhayo ya.
